timezone.description: Timezone the conference is in.  Use TZ name located here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones

jsonUrl.description: URL of the conference.json file containing conference data and schedules.

pollInterval.description: How often to poll the conference JSON file for updated session data in seconds.

confHashtag.description: The official conference Twitter hashtag.  Example: #glpa2018

collectionID.description: The ID of the curated collection.  Get this from TweetDeck's list -> View on Twitter.

APIKey.description: Consumer API Key -- Get this from https://developer.twitter.com -> Apps -> <app> -> Keys

APISecret.description: Consumer API Secret Key -- Get this from https://developer.twitter.com -> Apps -> <app> -> Keys

AccessToken.description: Access Token -- Get this from https://developer.twitter.com -> Apps -> <app> -> Keys

AccessSecret.description: Access Token Secret -- Get this from https://developer.twitter.com -> Apps -> <app> -> Keys

pollInterval.description: How often to poll Twitter for updates to the collection list in seconds.

displayTime.description: How long to display a tweet on the screen in seconds.

APIURL.description: Base URL of the DarkSky API.

location.description: The latitude and longitude (<latitude>,<longitude>) of the conference host's city.

poll_interval.description: How often, in minutes, to refresh data from DarkSky.  Minimum is every 5 minutes.
